description: Hundreds of people gather for a celebration of the life of Hector Duff, who died aged 101.
title: Hector Duff: Crowds honour Isle of Man D-Day veteran
title_page: Hector Duff: Crowds honour Isle of Man D-Day veteran - BBC News
maintext: He was awarded the Military Medal for bravery in the second Battle of El-Alamein and his 7th Armoured Division arrived in Normandy for the D-Day landings on 6 June 1944, continuing through France and into Germany before taking part in the Berlin Victory Parade.
